bug.author: fade2black
bug.description: Is there any detailed documentation for C APIs besides <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/install/lang_c#build>version example</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api.h>c_api.h</denchmark-link> ? For example, creating a session and tensors, running queries, get tensor result, etc.

comments.comment: Look at the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/c/c_api_test.cc>tests</denchmark-link> for usage examples, they are pretty thorough.
